column5: I thought Bruce was just into selling home made jigs, till I seen his post here in the classifieds. So inquired about what he had. A couple of emails later and,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,  Me buddy Terry and I put an order in . First time ordering from Bruce. I am very pleased with the quality and shipped right to my door.  I would highly recommend him to anyone.  And you wont beat the price.  Thanks bye.
Did you get a jar of dipping sauce! Always good to support Members!
No sauce. That needs to be a pick up thang.

I can't seem to find his ad in the classifieds  You are one up on me Cliff... I can't even find the classifieds...

I think we are on page 3 of the directory. http://ontariofishingcommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=37871  We have not put up any ads, but have been answering a couple of ISO's in the fishing classified
